articles.title: Robustness Measures for Welfare Analysis
articles.abstract: Economists routinely make functional form assumptions on demand curves to derive welfare conclusions. How sensitive are these conclusions to such assumptions? In this paper, we develop robustness measures that quantify the extent to which the true demand curve must deviate from common functional form assumptions in order to overturn a welfare conclusion. We parametrize this variability in terms of the gradient and curvature of the demand curve. By leveraging tools from information design, we show that our measures are easy to compute. Our measures are also flexible and easy to use, as we illustrate through empirical applications.
articles.title_cn: 福利分析的稳健性度量
articles.abstract_cn: 经济学家通常对需求曲线做出功能性形式假设，以推导出福利结论。这些结论对这些假设的敏感性如何？在本文中，我们开发了稳健性度量，以量化真实需求曲线必须偏离常见功能性形式假设的程度，以便推翻福利结论。我们以需求曲线的梯度和曲率来参数化这种变异性。通过利用信息设计的工具，我们展示了我们的度量是易于计算的。我们的度量也是灵活且易于使用的，正如我们通过实证应用所说明的。

articles.title: Keep Your Enemies Closer: Strategic Platform Adjustments during US and French Elections
articles.authors: Rafael Di Tella, Randy Kotti, Caroline Le Pennec, Vincent Pons
articles.abstract: We study changes in political discourse during campaigns, using a novel dataset of candidate websites for US House elections, 2002–2016, and manifestos for French parliamentary and local elections, 1958–2022. We find that candidates move to the center in ideology and rhetorical complexity between the first round (or primary) and the second round (or general election). This convergence reflects candidates' strategic adjustment to their opponents, as predicted by Downsian competition: Using an RDD we show that candidates converge to the platform of opponents who narrowly qualified for the last round as opposed to those who narrowly failed to qualify.
articles.title_cn: 让你的敌人更近一些：在美法选举期间的战略平台调整
articles.abstract_cn: 我们研究了竞选期间政治话语的变化，使用了一个新的数据集，包括2002年至2016年美国众议院选举的候选人网站，以及1958年至2022年法国议会和地方选举的宣言。我们发现，候选人在第一轮（或初选）和第二轮（或大选）之间，意识形态和修辞复杂性向中心靠拢。这种趋同反映了候选人根据唐斯理论的竞争预测，对他们的对手进行战略性调整：通过使用RDD（回归不连续设计），我们展示了候选人向那些勉强进入最后一轮的对手的平台靠拢，而不是那些勉强未能进入最后一轮的对手。

articles.title: Power Flows: Transmission Lines, Allocative Efficiency, and Corporate Profits
articles.abstract: Accelerated investment in electricity transmission could reduce total costs and enhance renewable integration. I document static allocative inefficiencies induced by incomplete market integration in 2 major US markets; these have risen over time and totaled $2 billion in 2022. I also argue that estimating firm-level impacts is important, as incumbents may have the power to block new lines and other reforms. I show that 4 firms would have experienced a collective $1.3 billion drop in net revenues in 2022 had the market been integrated, all there are reports of some of these firms blocking transmission projects.
articles.title_cn: 电力流动：输电线路、配置效率和企业利润
articles.abstract_cn: 加快电力传输投资可以降低总成本并增强可再生能源的整合。我记录了由于市场整合不完全而在两个主要美国市场中引起的静态配置效率低下；这些效率低下随着时间的推移而增加，并在2022年总计达到20亿美元。我还认为，估计公司层面的影响很重要，因为现有企业可能有能力阻止新线路和其他改革。我展示了如果市场被整合，4家公司在2022年将共同经历13亿美元的净收入下降，所有这些公司都有阻止输电项目的报道。

articles.title: Cursed Sequential Equilibrium
articles.authors: Meng-Jhang Fong, Po-Hsuan Lin, Thomas R. Palfrey
articles.abstract: This paper develops a framework to extend the strategic form analysis of cursed equilibrium (CE) developed by Eyster and Rabin (2005) to multistage games. The approach uses behavioral strategies rather than normal form mixed strategies and imposes sequential rationality. We define and characterize properties of cursed sequential equilibrium (CSE) and apply it to four canonical economic applications: signaling games, reputation building, durable goods monopoly, and the dirty faces game. These applications illustrate various implications of CSE, show how and why it differs from sequential equilibrium and CE, and provide evidence from laboratory experiments that support the empirical relevance of CSE.
articles.abstract_cn: 本文建立了一个框架，将Eyster和Rabin（2005）开发的诅咒均衡（CE）的战略形式分析扩展到多阶段游戏。这种方法使用行为策略而不是正规形式的混合策略，并施加顺序理性。我们定义并描述了诅咒顺序均衡（CSE）的属性，并将其应用于四个经典的经济应用：信号博弈、声誉建设、耐用品垄断和脏脸博弈。这些应用说明了CSE的各种含义，展示了它与顺序均衡和CE的不同之处以及原因，并提供了实验室实验的证据，支持CSE的经验相关性。

articles.title: The Negligible Effect of Free Contraception on Fertility: Experimental Evidence from Burkina Faso
articles.authors: Pascaline Dupas, Seema Jayachandran, Adriana Lleras-Muney, Pauline Rossi
articles.abstract: We conducted a randomized trial among 14,545 households in rural Burkina Faso to test the oft-cited hypothesis that limited access to contraception is an important driver of high fertility rates in West Africa. We do not find support for this hypothesis. Women who were given free access to modern contraception for three years did not have lower birth rates; we can reject even modest effects. We cross-randomized additional interventions to address inefficiencies that might depress demand for free contraception, specifically misperceptions about the child mortality rate and social norms. Free contraception did not significantly influence fertility even in combination with these interventions.
articles.title_cn: 来自布基纳法索的实验证据：免费避孕对生育率的微不足道的影响
articles.abstract_cn: 我们在布基纳法索农村地区对14,545户家庭进行了随机试验，以测试经常被引用的假设，即有限的避孕措施获取是西非高生育率的一个重要驱动因素。我们没有找到支持这一假设的证据。那些被给予三年免费现代避孕措施的女性并没有更低的生育率；我们甚至可以排除微小的影响。我们交叉随机化了额外的干预措施，以解决可能抑制对免费避孕需求的效率低下问题，特别是关于儿童死亡率的误解和社会规范。即使结合这些干预措施，免费避孕也没有显著影响生育率。

articles.title: Monopsony and Employer Misoptimization Explain Why Wages Bunch at Round Numbers
articles.authors: Arindrajit Dube, Alan Manning, Suresh Naidu
articles.abstract: We show that administrative hourly wage data exhibit considerable bunching at round numbers. We run two experiments randomizing wages around $0.10 and $1.00 to experimentally measure left-digit bias for identical tasks on Amazon Mechanical Turk; we fail to find any evidence of discontinuity in the labor supply function at round numbers despite estimating a considerable degree of monopsony. We replicate these results in administrative worker-firm hourly wage data from Oregon. We can rule out inattention estimates found in the behavioral product market literature. We provide evidence that firms "misoptimize" wage setting. More monopsony requires less employer misoptimization to explain bunching.
articles.title_cn: 垄断买方和雇主误优化解释了为什么工资会集中在整数上。
articles.abstract_cn: 我们发现，行政小时工资数据在整数附近有相当大的聚集现象。我们在亚马逊机械土耳其上对相同任务进行了两项实验，随机化工资为0.10美元和1.00美元，以实验性地测量左位数字偏见；尽管估计出相当程度的垄断买方力量，我们未能发现劳动供给函数在整数处有任何不连续性的证据。我们在俄勒冈州的行政工人-公司小时工资数据中复制了这些结果。我们可以排除行为产品市场文献中发现的注意力不足估计。我们提供了证据表明公司在工资设定上“误优化”。更多的垄断买方力量需要更少的雇主误优化来解释聚集现象。

articles.title: Employers and Unemployment Insurance Take-Up
articles.authors: Marta Lachowska, Isaac Sorkin, Stephen A. Woodbury
articles.abstract: We quantify the employer's role in unemployment insurance (UI) take-up. Employer effects on claiming and appeals are substantial, and those effects are negatively correlated, consistent with appeals deterring claims. Low-wage workers are less likely to claim and more likely to have their claims appealed than median-wage workers. Employer effects help explain these income gradients, so equalizing employer effects on claiming would increase the progressivity of UI. Finally, the main source of targeting error in UI is that eligible workers do not claim.
articles.title_cn: 雇主和失业保险参与度
articles.abstract_cn: 我们量化了雇主在失业保险（UI）参与中的作用。雇主对申请和上诉的影响是显著的，而且这些影响是负相关的，这与上诉阻止申请是一致的。低工资工人比中等工资工人更不可能申请，并且他们的申请更有可能被上诉。雇主效应有助于解释这些收入梯度，因此，使雇主对申请的影响均等化将增加UI的累进性。最后，UI中定位错误的主要来源是符合条件的工人不申请。

articles.title: From Retributive to Restorative: An Alternative Approach to Justice in Schools
articles.authors: Anjali Adukia, Benjamin Feigenberg, Fatemeh Momeni
articles.abstract: School districts historically approached conflict resolution from the perspective that suspending disruptive students was necessary to protect their classmates, even if this caused harm to perceived offenders. Restorative practices (RP)—focusing on reparation, accountability, and shared ownership of disciplinary justice—are designed to address undesirable behavior without harming students. We study Chicago Public Schools' adoption of RP and find that suspensions and arrests decreased, driven by effects for Black students. We find null effects on test score value added, ruling out meaningful average declines. We estimate a 15 percent decrease in out-of-school arrests, consistent with RP substantively changing student behavior.
articles.title_cn: 从报复性到恢复性：学校中正义的替代方法
articles.abstract_cn: 学区历来从保护同学免受干扰的角度来处理冲突解决，认为必须停学扰乱秩序的学生，即使这会对被视为违规者的学生造成伤害。恢复性实践（RP）——专注于修复、问责和共享纪律正义——旨在解决不良行为而不伤害学生。我们研究了芝加哥公立学校采用RP的情况，发现停学和逮捕减少了，这主要是由于对黑人学生的影响。我们发现对考试成绩增值的影响为零，排除了平均下降的可能性。我们估计校外逮捕减少了15%，这与RP实质性改变学生行为是一致的。

articles.title: Underbidding for Oil and Gas Tracts
articles.authors: Julien Martin, Martin Pesendorfer, Jack Shannon
articles.abstract: Common values auction models, where bidder decisions depend on noisy signals of common values, provide predictions about Bayesian Nash equilibrium (BNE) outcomes. In settings where these common values can be estimated, these predictions can be tested. We propose a series of tests, robust to assumptions about the signal structure, to determine whether the observed data could have been generated by a Bayesian Nash equilibrium. In the setting of oil and gas lease auctions in New Mexico, we find evidence that participation decisions are correlated and that participants systematically underbid in light of ex post outcomes.
articles.title_cn: 石油和天然气区块的低报价
articles.abstract_cn: 在共同价值拍卖模型中，竞拍者的决策取决于共同价值的噪声信号，这些模型提供了关于贝叶斯纳什均衡（BNE）结果的预测。在可以估计这些共同价值的情况下，可以测试这些预测。我们提出了一系列测试，这些测试对信号结构的假设是稳健的，以确定观察到的数据是否可能由贝叶斯纳什均衡产生。在新墨西哥州石油和天然气租赁拍卖的背景下，我们发现参与决策是相关的，并且参与者在考虑到事后结果的情况下系统性地出价过低。

articles.title: Direct and Indirect Effects of Investment Tax Incentives
articles.abstract: This paper estimates the direct effects and indirect spillover effects of investment tax credits on firms. Exploiting a differential tax credit rate change by firm size in the German manufacturing sector, I find that lowering a firm's investment cost by 7.6 percent increases its capital stock by 17.7 percent and employment by 12.0 percent. Positive local spillovers generate one additional manufacturing job for each directly created job, are strongest between firms in industries connected through input-output linkages, and arise within distances of five kilometers. Firms dependent on local consumer demand also increase employment, while within-industry spillovers generate small negative effects.
articles.title_cn: 投资税收激励的直接和间接效应
articles.abstract_cn: 本文估计了投资税收抵免对企业的直接影响和间接溢出效应。利用德国制造业中不同企业规模的投资税收抵免率变化，我发现降低企业投资成本7.6%可以使其资本存量增加17.7%，就业增加12.0%。积极的本地溢出效应为每个直接创造的制造业工作创造了一个额外的工作，这些效应在通过投入产出联系连接的行业之间的企业中最为强烈，并在五公里的距离内产生。依赖本地消费者需求的企业也增加了就业，而行业内的溢出效应产生了小的负面影响。

articles.title: Monetary Policy and Rational Asset Price Bubbles: Comment
articles.authors: Franklin Allen, Gadi Barlevy, Douglas Gale
articles.abstract: Galí (2014) showed that a monetary policy rule that raises rates when bubbles exceed some steady-state benchmark can paradoxically lead to larger deviations from steady state. Nevertheless, this comment shows that a central bank can always dampen a bubble by setting a higher-than-expected rate, although it may have to raise the rate aggressively. This is a different point from the Miao, Shen, and Wang (2019) comment on Galí (2014). They showed that when the central bank targets a different steady state than Gali considered, raising rates when bubbles exceed this alternative benchmark leads to smaller deviations from steady state.
articles.title_cn: 货币政策与理性资产价格泡沫：评论
articles.abstract_cn: Galí（2014）表明，当泡沫超过某个稳态基准时提高利率的货币政策规则，可能会自相矛盾地导致更大的偏离稳态。然而，这篇评论显示，中央银行总是可以通过设定一个高于预期的利率来抑制泡沫，尽管它可能不得不激进地提高利率。这是与Miao, Shen和Wang（2019）对Galí（2014）的评论不同的观点。他们表明，当中央银行针对与Galí考虑的不同稳态时，提高利率当泡沫超过这个替代基准会导致更小的偏离稳态。
